I will follow up with you on Goodyear Pricing, from Freightliner, and local WD’s
Thanks for all your help.

Altoona, WI 54720

item.title: Alex Mendoza: FW: Pricing on AC29884PG...Direct Ship
item.description:
For voice of customer
From: Podewell, Kerri Sent: Thursday, May 10, 2012 1:44 PM To: Mendoza, Alex; Hoefferle, Gina; Felicelli, Joe Cc: Stone, Linda B Subject: FW: Pricing on AC29884PG...Direct Ship
Gina and Joe –
Competitive intel.
Alex –
Please add to our “VOC” database.
Thanks Linda for sending….we are consolidating a large population of data with which we are using for review in the next 30 days as well as developing a process for continued review moving forward.
Regards,
Kerri
From: Stone, Linda B Sent: Wednesday, May 09, 2012 5:08 PM To: Podewell, Kerri Cc: Bartz, Mike Subject: Pricing on AC29884PG...Direct Ship
AA Wheel, Kansas City, Mo. sells this wheel to end user for $137………….our DN is $155.78
Dealer is buying from AA wheel….no freight and lower price. I don’t know what our cost is, but would be good to check it out, since it is exact same product…apples for apples
Linda Stone, PSM-Parts

item.title: Kerri Podewell: FW: pricing
item.description:
While this is an email….the source info is good.
Can we note vendor in the database? It would be compared to DNet (but we will also compare to our cost in the end….)
KP
From: Chuck Imbler, Jr. [mailto:chuckjr@truckcenterinc.com] Sent: Wednesday, April 25, 2012 4:21 PM To: Podewell, Kerri Subject: FW: pricing
Here is a pricing Issue from Ed Kyrish out of Houston Texas. We also buy product from the company he references TTAC and there prices are much cheaper than Navistar.
Chuck Imbler, Jr.
________________________________
From: ekyrish@aol.com [mailto:ekyrish@aol.com] Sent: Wednesday, April 25, 2012 4:15 PM To: chuckjr@truckcenterinc.com Subject: Fwd: pricing
FYI
-----Original Message----- From: RONNIE HARTMAN <RHARTMAN@INTLTRUCKS.COM> To: ekyrish <ekyrish@aol.com> Sent: Wed, Apr 25, 2012 11:26 am Subject: FW: pricing
Ed
FYI
We need to discuss we can purchase from a company called TTAC cost is $175.00.
Something is very wrong with Navistar’s pricing
Ronnie
From: RAY ZATOPEK [mailto:RZATOPEK@INTLTRUCKS.COM <mailto:RZATOPEK@INTLTRUCKS.COM?> ] Sent: Tuesday, April 24, 2012 3:30 PM To: rhartman@intltrucks.com <mailto:rhartman@intltrucks.com> Subject: pricing
Ronnie, as our conversation here are the part numbers and issues , first Cy Fair I.S.D. drivers heater core 2585989c1 natl fleet $ 909.00 , they said they
Can purchase this locally under a Kysor # 2612251 for $ 189.00, second pricing complaints on surge tank # 2602943c91 this price has increased
From 2010 for $ 95.00, to 2011 $ 221.00, to current price of $ 315.68 this is a duel port sure tank with a long hose and a piece of reflective tape
There is another tank ( the tank itself is identical ) with a shorter hose and no tape 2602872c91 that sell for $ 153.09 customers do not understand
Why such an increase and price difference. Thanks Ray Z.

item.title: Kerri Podewell: FW: Scanned from ToshParts 04/25/2012 14:44
item.description:
Email and file….
From: Chuck Imbler, Jr. [mailto:chuckjr@truckcenterinc.com] Sent: Wednesday, April 25, 2012 4:24 PM To: Podewell, Kerri Subject: FW: Scanned from ToshParts 04/25/2012 14:44
More pricing issues from Houston Texas
Chuck Imbler, Jr.
________________________________
From: ekyrish@aol.com [mailto:ekyrish@aol.com] Sent: Wednesday, April 25, 2012 4:18 PM To: chuckjr@truckcenterinc.com Subject: Fwd: Scanned from ToshParts 04/25/2012 14:44
I TALKED WITH THREE DIFFERENT DEALERS. IT SEEMS LIKE AT THE MOMENT FLYERS ARE NOT IN VOGUE.
PRICING COMPARISONS ARE WORSE THAN EVER. LET ME EXPLAIN THE ATTACHED.
ITEM # 1. THIS IS A PTO WE ARE INSTALLING ON 50 NEW UNITS. NAV. PRICE IS $ 581.96. CUSTOMER WAS
QUOTED $ 495.02. OBVIOUSLY OUR COMPETITION IS MAKING A PROFIT. WE HAVE ASKED FOR AN SPA.
WE WILL PURCHASE OUTSIDE IF WE DO NOT HEAR PROMPTLY.
ITEM # 2
IN THE SPIRIT OF DEALING WITH CARQUEST WE PURCHASED THIS BATTERY FOR 100.07. NAV.DEALER NET
WAS $ 49.05 . WHERE IS THE RECIPROCITY?
ITEM # 3.
THIS IS A PAGE FROM A COMPETITOR SHOWING THE HEATER CORE REFERRED TO YOU IN THE MESSAGE
I FORWARDED YOUFROM RON HARTMAN. THE PRICING IS RIDICULOUS.
DISREGARD THE SEAL PRICING MEMO. I ADDRESSED IT LAST YEAR. DON'T KNOW HOW IT GOT COPIED.
SORRY COULD NOT GIVE YOU MORE. I WILL FORWARD JACK SAUMS RESPONSE.
-----Original Message----- From: scanner1 <scanner1@intltrucks.com> To: ED KYRISH <ekyrish@aol.com> Sent: Wed, Apr 25, 2012 3:48 pm Subject: Scanned from ToshParts 04/25/2012 14:44
Scanned from ToshParts. Date: 04/25/2012 14:44 Pages:5 Resolution:200x200 DPI ---------------------------------------- This is automated scan. Please do not reply.

item.title: Kerri Podewell: FW: Emailing: 20120518084632832
item.description:

Thanks, Kerri

Kerri Here is another line of parts (Bendix) that might need to be looked at.

item.title: Kerri Podewell: FW: Competitive Information
item.description:
Info to VOC
From: Hoefferle, Gina Sent: Monday, May 21, 2012 10:29 AM To: vincentwigfield@delvaltrucks.com Cc: Benko, Russell; Houseward, David N; Price; Podewell, Kerri Subject: FW: Competitive Information
Vince,
Thank you for sharing the data. I do have a question. Can you tell me what price level these prices would be compared to?
· For example, the Bendix 102657N is advertised at $21.91 in attachment 5. Current Navistar National Fleet is $12.89 and Retail is $25.86 for part BX102657N. Would you be competing at the Retail price level with this competitor?
· Bendix Air Dryer Cartridge is 109685X is $157.91 in the advertisement. Navistar National Fleet is $179.17 and Retail is $378.13. What price level would we be comparing to in this example?
Thanks,
NAVISTAR-Parts_SIG_rev
Gina Hoefferle
Pricing Manager
Navistar, Inc.
2701 Navistar Drive
Lisle, IL 60532
P: 331-332-3712
E: Gina.Hoefferle@Navistar.com
From: Vincent Wigfield [mailto:vincentwigfield@delvaltrucks.com] Sent: Friday, May 18, 2012 12:09 PM To: Price Cc: Todd Moyer; Carroll, Kevin J Subject: Competitive Information
Greetings:
The six attachments, submitted for your information, are examples of competitive pricing we continuously face in our market area.
Please contact our Parts Manager, Todd Moyer, or me with any questions you may have.
Thank you,
Vince Wigfield,
Del-Val International Trucks, Inc.
